formulas.raw: $$ A_s = \frac{\pi d^2}{4} \qquad A_t \approx 0.78\,A_s $$ $$ F_{v,Rd} = \frac{\alpha_v\, f_{ub}\, A}{\gamma_{M2}} $$ where A = As (threads not in shear) or A = At (threads in shear). $$ F_{t,Rd} = \frac{0.9 \, f_{ub} \, A_t}{\gamma_{M2}} $$ For a connection with n bolts and n_v shear planes per bolt: $$ F_{v,Rd}^{(conn)} = n \, n_v \, F_{v,Rd}^{(per\;plane)} \qquad F_{t,Rd}^{(conn)} = n \, F_{t,Rd}^{(per\;bolt)} $$ Combined (non-preloaded bearing bolts â€“ conservative approximation): $$ \left(\frac{F_{t,Ed}^{(per\;bolt)}}{F_{t,Rd}^{(per\;bolt)}}\right)^2 + \left(\frac{F_{v,Ed}^{(per\;bolt)}}{F_{v,Rd}^{(per\;bolt)}}\right)^2 \le 1.0 $$
